snippet: An airstrike by coalition forces killed four policemen and two civilians whose car was being searched at a checkpoint in eastern Afghanistan, an Afghan official said Thursday.
abstract: Airstrike by coalition forces mistakenly kills four policemen and two civilians whose car was being searched at checkpoint in eastern Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: An airstrike by coalition forces killed four policemen and two civilians whose car was being searched at a checkpoint in eastern Afghanistan, an Afghan official said Thursday.

headline.seo: Afghanistan: Errant Airstrike Kills 6, Official Says
headline.main: Afghanistan: Errant Airstrike Kills 6, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Errant Airstrike Kills 6, Official Says
